value:
$nMPID_フィヨルム|Ylgr is also curious about the ninja
festival. It seems ninja are as popular
with children as they are with adults!

$nMPID_フィヨルム|The Kingdoms of Flame and Ice may
seem at odds, but I believe Princess
Laegjarn and I can still be friends.

$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|I have come to learn the importance
of allies. With them, even the most
challenging goals can be achieved.

$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|I hear some ninja techniques require
the use of flames. I ought to be
particularly well-suited to those.

$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Are these extravagant outfits not
rather counterproductive to a
ninja's goal of blending in?

I am Laegjarn. Princess Fjorm and I
are participating in a ninja festival at
$Nf's castle.

$nMPID_フィヨルム|Have we done it, Princess Laegjarn?
Have we finally mastered the
Sparkling Shuriken?

$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Mission accomplished. I suppose
I could get used to this.
$nMPID_フィヨルム|Oh no! Have we been spotted?!

$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|It would seem our rigorous training
has borne fruit, if you are entrusting
us with this.

Ninja Fjorm, reporting for duty!
Princess Laegjarn is here too—
go on, ninja partner! Say hi!

$nMPID_フィヨルム|Well, Princess Laegjarn, I think our
mission has been a success. This
ninja festival may be the best yet.$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|If that is true, it is thanks to your
boundless enthusiasm. I would never
have achieved this on my own.$k$p$nMPID_フィヨルム|I could say the same to you! I think
we've made a wonderful team.$k$p$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|This experience has been a powerful
reminder of how much I've changed.
My old self would...not be here.$k$pBut there is no use dwelling on the
past. I am here now, because a friend
has brought out the best in me.$k$p$nMPID_フィヨルム|This is just the beginning, Laegjarn.
Our friendship is only going to grow
from here.
$nMPID_二人|Together!
$nMPID_二人|Your life...is ours to take!
$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|You've underestimated us.
$nMPID_フィヨルム|We have you now!
Is it we who have lost?
From the shadows...
I believe in you!

The power of the ninja.
Prepare yourself!

Chilling Blades!
Brrr!

• As a partner, will I suffice?
• Of course!
Sure...
From darkness, into darkness...
Staying quiet...
$nMPID_フィヨルム|Yah! Tah! Hu-AH! Sparkling Shuriken!
$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Sparkling Shuriken?

$nMPID_フィヨルム|Oh...that? Princess Elise taught me
how ninja announce their attacks. She
participated in this festival before.
She said it's a ninja tradition.

$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|I see... There is much to the art of
the ninja, it seems.

$nMPID_フィヨルム|I suppose so. But even if it's what I'm
SUPPOSED to do, it does feel a bit
strange to just shout it out.$k$pSparkling Shuriken!
$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Hehe... Hahaha...
$nMPID_フィヨルム|What's so funny?

$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|It is good to see you doing no more
than simply having fun.

You had so much on your mind...
I prefer seeing a smile on your face.

$nMPID_フィヨルム|Now that you mention it... I hadn't
even thought about it.

There's something different about
you too. It seems like your sharp
edges have become...softened.

You remind me of Gunnthrá.
Just a bit.

$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Do I? For I wish you to feel less like
I'm your older sister, and more like
we're the friends we have become.

$nMPID_フィヨルム|Oh! We have become friends,
haven't we?

$nMPID_比翼レーギャルン|Yes. And now, we are partners who
must rely upon each other. I look
forward to it.

$nMPID_フィヨルム|As do I! Let's enjoy the festival as
much as we can.
